mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room a where (a.address like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or a.name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or a.num in (SELECT roomNum FROM roomCategory b where b.categoryNum in( SELECT c.num FROM category c where c.cname like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')))) and (a.headCount>=#{headCount}) and(a.weekAmPrice between #{sprice} and #{eprice}) and(a.payment like CONCAT('%',#{payment},'%'))and(a.holiday != #{holiday}) and (a.stime >= #{stime}) and(a.etime <= #{etime}) order by ${sort}
